  • Method Details

    • init

      protected abstract void init()
      Basic initialization executed at the start of the constructor.

    • generateSteps

      protected abstract List<Step> generateSteps() throws InstantiationException
      Generates the list of Steps that together will make up the procedure.
      Returns:
      The list of Steps that together will make up the procedure.
      Throws:
      InstantiationException - When a step's factory is incomplete or otherwise invalid.

    • cleanUpProcess

      protected final void cleanUpProcess()
      Takes care of the final part of the process. This unregisters this ToolUser and removes the tool from the player's inventory (if they still have it).

    • abort

      public void abort()

    • giveTool

      protected final void giveTool(String nameKey, String loreKey, @Nullable @Nullable Text text)
      Adds the AnimatedArchitecture tool from the player's inventory.
      Parameters:
      nameKey - The localization key of the name of the tool.
      loreKey - The localization key of the lore of the tool.
      text - The message to send to the player after giving them the tool.

    • removeTool

      protected final void removeTool()
      Removes the AnimatedArchitecture tool from the player's inventory.

    • getCurrentStepMessage

      public Text getCurrentStepMessage()
      Gets the message for the current step.
      Returns:
      The message of the current step if possible. Otherwise, an empty String is returned.

    • prepareCurrentStep

      protected void prepareCurrentStep()
      Prepares the next step. For example by sending the player some instructions about what they should do.

      This should be used after proceeding to the next step.

    • skipToStep

      protected boolean skipToStep(Step goalStep)
      See Procedure.skipToStep(Step).

      After successfully skipping to the target step, the newly-selected step will be prepared. See prepareCurrentStep().

    • handleInput

      public boolean handleInput(@Nullable @Nullable Object obj)
      Handles user input for the given step.
      Parameters:
      obj - The input to handle. What actual type is expected depends on the step.
      Returns:
      True if the input was processed successfully.

    • sendMessage

      protected void sendMessage()
      Sends the localized message of the current step to the player that owns this object.

    • getCurrentStep

      public Optional<Step> getCurrentStep()
      Gets the Step in the procedure this ToolUser is currently at.
      Returns:
      The current Step in the procedure.

    • playerHasAccessToLocation

      public boolean playerHasAccessToLocation(ILocation loc)
      Checks if a player is allowed to break the block in a given location.

      If the player is not allowed to break blocks in the location, a message will be sent to them (provided the name of the compat isn't empty).

      Parameters:
      loc - The location to check.
      Returns:
      True if the player is allowed to break the block at the given location.

    • playerHasAccessToCuboid

      public boolean playerHasAccessToCuboid(Cuboid cuboid, IWorld world)
      Checks if a player is allowed to break all blocks in a given cuboid.

      If the player is not allowed to break one or more blocks in the cuboid, a message will be sent to them. (provided the name of the compat isn't empty).

      Parameters:
      cuboid - The cuboid to check.
      world - The world to check in.
      Returns:
      True if the player is allowed to break all blocks inside the cuboid.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Keeps track of whether this ToolUser is active or not.
      Returns:
      true if this tool user is active.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • getPlayer

      public IPlayer getPlayer()

    • getProcedure

      public Procedure getProcedure()
      The Procedure that this ToolUser will go through.
